hero.title: Maritime Expertise in Morocco
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for cargo inspection, draft survey and all your port operations.

contact.title: Your trusted partner in port operations
contact.e1_desc: Authorized for all your maritime inspections and cargo expertise.
contact.e2_desc: A team of qualified experts at your service in all Moroccan ports.
contact.e3_desc: Strategic presence in Casablanca, Tangier and Jorf Lasfar for quick interventions.
contact.form_subtitle: Our team of experts is available to answer your questions and accompany you in your maritime inspection projects.
contact.form_cta_subtitle: Fill out the form below and we will respond as soon as possible.
contact.success_message: Message sent successfully! We will respond as soon as possible.
contact.success_quotation: Quote request sent successfully! We will respond as soon as possible.

footer.about: Approved maritime inspection company. We support shipowners, shippers and freight forwarders for all your inspection operations: draft survey, on/offhire, under keel clearance.
footer.newsletter_text: Subscribe to receive the latest maritime news.

about.title: Your trusted partner in port operations
about.subtitle: inspec is an approved maritime inspection company, committed to expertise and quality for the international shipping industry.
about.cta_subtitle: Contact us for a free consultation.
about.mission_text: Since our creation, we have been committed to providing high-quality maritime inspection services to ensure the accuracy of loading and unloading operations. Our expertise covers all aspects of cargo inspection.
about.mission_text2: We support shipowners, shippers and freight forwarders in their port operations, offering detailed reports and personalized recommendations.
about.value1_desc: Recognized expertise in the field of maritime inspection and cargo surveying.
about.value2_desc: Certified and experienced inspectors guaranteeing the quality of our interventions in all ports.
about.value3_desc: Compliance with IACS standards and international maritime regulations.
about.value4_desc: Strategic presence in Casablanca, Tanger and Jorf Lasfar for national coverage.

services.title: Complete Maritime Expertise
services.subtitle: High-quality maritime inspection services to ensure the accuracy of your port operations.
services.process_step1_desc: Contact us to define your needs and get a detailed quote.
services.process_step2_desc: Our inspectors carry out the inspection on site according to current standards.
services.process_step3_desc: You receive a detailed report with findings and recommendations.
services.process_step4_desc: We remain available for any questions or clarification.
services.cta_subtitle: Request a free quote and our team will contact you shortly.
services.draft_survey_desc: Precise measurement of the ship's draft to accurately determine the weight of cargo loaded or unloaded. Compliant with IMO rules and international standards.
services.on_offhire_desc: Complete inspection of the ship's condition during take-up or return. Detailed evaluation of equipment and cargo.
services.under_keel_desc: Precise control of hold and fuel filling. Loading check to optimize space and ship stability.
services.cargo_desc: Inspection and survey of all types of cargo: bulk, liquid, containers. Damage assessment and loss quantification.
services.temperature_desc: Verification and calibration of temperature control systems for sensitive cargo (pharmaceutical, food products).
services.preport_desc: Complete ship audit before port entry. Evaluation of compliance with port and international regulations.

references.title: They trust us
references.subtitle: For over 15 years, we have been supporting the biggest names in the Moroccan maritime industry.
references.cta_subtitle: Trust our expertise for your maritime inspections.

blog.title: Maritime News
blog.subtitle: Discover the latest news, regulations and practical tips in the field of maritime inspection.
blog.newsletter_text: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest maritime news.

home.seo_title: inspec - Maritime inspection company in Morocco
home.seo_description: inspec is your trusted partner for maritime inspection in Morocco. Draft survey services, on/offhire inspection, under keel clearance, and cargo expertise for commercial ships.
